msbt.message: It just hit me that I've never talked to . There anything I oughta know about 'em?There's a look of determination in those eyes that's justamazing. It's super intense, !
You catch what 's been up to?
You hear what was doing the other day?
Now that I think of it, I haven't seen around. You talked to 'em lately?Well, wherever 's got to, I just hope the parties are rockin', !
You catch what was up to today?'Cause I didn't! But I did see 'em wearin' a goofy smirk. No clue what that was about, .
You see what was up to yesterday, ?'Cause I missed it! I saw 'em starin' off into space for a while, but that was it. Any ideas?
Hmm I just realized I haven't seen for a few days. Know anything about that?A friend told me about a super-secret rock show the other day. Think that's where is?
Did you spot what was up to? I'm trying to figure out if it's some thing.
You hear what was up to on that visit from a while back?
Hey, remember ? What a rock star! I can't wait to see 'em again, .Seriously, I had no idea folks from were so cool!
's a good buddy of yours, right? The one from , ?As soon as I saw you two together, it was obvious why you two are friends. Like how you're both total rock stars!

When was the last time you heard from ? You ever visit 'em on ?I used to love surprising my friends and crashing on their couch for the weekend, .Sometimes I got the feeling they didn't love it as much as I did, though. Oh well
You have fun hanging out with ? You know, the tourist from .Ha! I can't believe I got to say that. It's so cool that 's getting tourists now, !
I've got a REALLY weird question for you. OK What's wearin' shoes like? I've worn socks, but never shoes.I asked , that tourist from , but I want your take too!Oh, and no rush. Think on it.
Yeah, I missed it too. But I DID see 'em runnin' around for just about the whole day, .It looked like was having a really good time!
I saw 'em hanging out by the water, fishing. I've never seen someone look so focused, !
I watched 'em snatching up bugs left and right. Those were some serious net skills, !
I noticed 'em walking around the beach picking up shells. Know anything about that?I bet I've got some shells I could send their way if that's what they're into, .
I saw 'em running toward me with a shovel and for a half-second was like, "Oh no! My flowers!"But nope! The shovel was for clamming down on the beach, . Whew!
I spotted 'em hitting balloons with a slingshot. I couldn't believe how good their aim was, !
I saw 'em starin' up at the sky, hyper focused, wishing on stars. I hope everything's alright, .
I found 'em shaking trees, one after another. DOES know wasps live in trees, right?
I saw 'em smacking trees and grabbing up armfuls of wood.Any recipe that needs that much wood has GOT to be cool!
I saw 'em chopping down a whole mess of trees. Just one after another after another, . I'm not naming names, but someone MIGHT have told 'em we needed a clearing for a concert stage. Yeah
I spied 'em getting their hands dirty planting a whole bunch of, uh something, .OK, so I didn't see what was planted, but if it makes a little leafier, then awesome!
I watched 'em going around watering flowers. How totally rad is that? I gotta hang out with 'em more often!
I saw 'em doing all kinds of goofy expressions. It was like their face was made of rubber, !
There was no stopping 'em! It was just one trip after another for them.Gotta say, from what little I saw of , it looked like a lot of fun, !
I saw 'em hanging out with all kinds of folks. It looked like a totally rockin' party, !
I spied 'em toilin' away at a workbench, smashing out all kinds of DIY stuff, .It looked like a ton of work, but I caught a peek at the results and they were AWESOME!
Hey, doesn't have super-secret monster strength or anything like thatright?'Cause I saw 'em break about a billion tools, !
I guess was, like, hunkered down at home. Hope everything's OK,
I saw 'em hanging out outside. I was just wondering if found anything cool, .
I saw 'em digging holes everywhere. You think those're for some kind of prank? 'Cause I want in, .
I saw 'em fall into a few holes. I just hope they're alright, .
I mean, there was SO MUCH NOISE coming from 's house. So mayberemodeling?
I saw 'em doing custom-design stuff on their phone, .Alright, yeah, I was being super nosy and looking over their shoulder, but in my defense, I was REALLY curious!
I certainly did! I spent almost all day chatting with 'em. Turns out we've got a lot in common, .
I saw 'em chatting and laughing and stuff with . They were REALLY getting along!
I saw 'em talking toEVERYBODY! It was like watching a super-social tornado run around, .
It was wild. The wasps just loved 'em. It was just one sting after another after another. Yikes!
I saw 'em get unlucky with a wasp. The sting looked MEAN too, like the wasp had a grudge or something.
I watched 'em digging up fossils. HmmI should go see if Blathers got anything new, .
I saw 'em smacking rocks, but I couldn't tell if it was for DIY stuff, or for working out some frustration.
Someone saw 'em bury a pile of cold, hard Bells in the ground. Word is there's a sprout there now too!
I caught 'em grabbing up a whole mess of fruit. Maybe it's for a smoothie, ?
I saw 'em checking their phone every 10 seconds, . Nobody could get THAT lost here, right?
I saw 'em on their phone for a really long time. I'm surprised they didn't walk into a building or anything.
I saw 'em put a bunch of time into roads and paths and stuff. Gotta say, it's way easier to get around now!
I noticed 'em digging rivers and stuff. Hey, if it makes it easier for me to water my flowers, then cool.
I saw 'em building up cliffs and stuff. Moving so much dirt and rock around is super-hard work, but it paid off!
I saw 'em messing with fences a bunch, . Hey, you gotta keep your garden in check, right?
I saw 'em moving a bunch of stuff around outside, trying to get it all placed just right, .I like what it did for the flow of the place. Maybe now I won't trip so much on my night strolls!
I saw 'em grinning like a fool at their phone. I thought I heard something about their Nook Miles.Wonder how they're gonna spend them all, .

You should've seen 'em walking out of Resident Services. That gigantic smile could only mean one thingThey paid off a loan! Go them!I wonder what their strategy was, 'cause at the rate I'm going I might break even inlike years.
I saw 'em over by Nook's Cranny goin' in and out, over and over again. Any idea what that was about?I mean, I've been indecisive about furniture or whatever before, but never like THAT, .
I heard 'em humming up a new island tune. The new one rocks, if I say so myself, !
I saw 'em tinkering with the new flag design. You checked it out yet? It's flyin' over Resident Services.
I saw 'em waving their wardrobe- wand thingie a bunch. Some of those outfits were Whoa, !

I saw 'em soarin' around on their vaulting pole. Their technique was perfect, .I actually used to do pole vaulting, but after I slid off my pole near the top and hit my headthat was that.Still love watching it, though!
I saw 'em buying up Daisy Mae's turnips. Think they're trying to game the market, ?
I saw 'em cashing in turnips for some serious Bells. Good for them!I'm kinda jealous. My turnips, uh were delicious. Bells would've been WAY cooler than a stomach ache
I heard 'em talking to OK, I didn't catch who they were talking to, but wow! Were they ever talkin'!
I watched 'em yankin' up bunches of weeds. That was really cool of them.Guess that's my cue to start throwin' down flowers, !
You have GOT to check out their new hairstyle, !I mean, If I were them, I would've gone for something a bit more street punk, but they really do look good!
'Cause I almost didn't. They changed up their face, whichwhoa. I had no idea that was possible, .
I saw 'em taking a lot of photos. And I mean a LOT of photos. Take two steps, snap. Two more steps, snap.I guess maybe they're SUPER into scrapbooking. Or maybe it's for a live-action flipbook, .
